remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用[!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]和的数据绑定方案可以通过类型化或非类型化的，提供该表的默认视图。 enables data-binding scenarios for [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] and can be created from a typed or untyped , providing a default view of that table. 在从 创建 后，可以在其上设置筛选和排序。Filtering and sorting can be set on the after it has been created from a . 然后，将绑定到一个 UI 控件 （如或），提供一个简单的数据绑定模型。 The is then bound to a UI control, such as a or a , providing a simple data binding model. 有关详细信息和示例，请参阅[创建 DataView 对象](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-dataview-object-linq-to-dataset.md)。For more information and examples, see [Creating a DataView Object](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-dataview-object-linq-to-dataset.md). ## Examples 下面的示例从 SalesOrderDetail 表创建，并将其设置为对象的数据源，该对象用作控件的代理：The following example creates a from the SalesOrderDetail table and sets it as the data source of a object, which acts as a proxy for a control: [!code-csharp[DP DataView Samples#CreateLDVFromTable](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP DataView Samples/CS/Form1.cs#createldvfromtable)] [!code-vb[DP DataView Samples#CreateLDVFromTable](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP DataView Samples/VB/Form1.vb#createldvfromtable)]

summary.span: 创建并返回一个支持 LINQ 的 对象，该对象表示 [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] 查询。

span.span: Creates and returns a LINQ-enabled object representing the [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] query.

returns.span: 支持 LINQ 的 对象。

span.span: A LINQ-enabled object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为[!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]启用的数据绑定方案，可以[!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]通过查询创建。 enables data binding scenarios for [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] and can be created from a [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] query. 表示查询本身，而不是查询顶部的视图。The represents the query itself, and is not a view on top of the query. 新创建的将从创建它的查询推断筛选和排序信息。The newly created infers the filtering and sorting information from the query it is created from. 然后，将绑定到 UI 控件 （如或），从而提供简单的数据绑定模型。 The is then bound to a UI control, such as a or a , providing a simple data-binding model. 输入参数`T` `source`的参数只能为类型或派生自的类型。The parameter `T` of the input parameter `source` can only be of type or a type derived from . 以下查询运算符仅在用于创建的查询中受支持：The following query operators, only, are supported in a query used to create : - - - - - - - 有关详细信息和示例，请参阅[创建 DataView 对象](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-dataview-object-linq-to-dataset.md)。For more information and examples, see [Creating a DataView Object](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-dataview-object-linq-to-dataset.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建按总计到期顺序排序的联机订单：The following example creates a of online orders ordered by total due: [!code-csharp[DP DataView Samples#CreateLDVFromQuery1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP DataView Samples/CS/Form1.cs#createldvfromquery1)] [!code-vb[DP DataView Samples#CreateLDVFromQuery1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP DataView Samples/VB/Form1.vb#createldvfromquery1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)]查询可用于实现接口或接口的数据源。queries work on data sources that implement the interface or the interface. [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] `From`类不实现任何一个接口，因此必须调用方法，以便在查询的子句中使用作为源。 The class does not implement either interface, so you must call the method to use the as a source in the `From` clause of a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query. 还可以通过返回对象来获取自定义的、特定于域的运算符，例如。You can also obtain custom, domain-specific operators, such as , by returning an object. 方法返回的可枚举对象将永久绑定到生成它的。The enumerable object returned by the method is permanently bound to the that produced it. 多次调用方法将返回多个独立的可查询对象，这些对象都绑定到源。Multiple calls to the method will return multiple, independent queryable objects that are all bound to the source . ## Examples 在下面的示例中， `DisplayProducts`方法接收包含名为`ProductName`的 DataColumn 的 DataTable，提取`ProductName`值，然后打印这些值。In the following sample, the `DisplayProducts` method receives a DataTable that contains a DataColumn named `ProductName`, extracts the `ProductName` values and then prints the values. [!code-csharp[system.data.DataTableExtensions.AsEnumerable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.data.datatableextensions.asenumerable/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[system.data.DataTableExtensions.AsEnumerable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.data.datatableextensions.asenumerable/vb/source.vb#1)]

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 源序列中的对象类型（通常为 ）。

The source sequence.

summary.span: 在给定其泛型参数 为 的输入 对象的情况下，返回包含 对象副本的 。

span.span: Returns a that contains copies of the objects, given an input object where the generic parameter is .

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含作为 对象的类型的输入序列。

span.span: A that contains the input sequence as the type of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输入参数`T` `source`的参数只能为类型或派生自的类型。The parameter `T` of the input parameter `source` can only be of type or a type derived from . 输入序列可以是任何源，不仅可以是查询，也可以是查询。 The input sequence can be any source, not only a query or a query over a . 请注意，如果源序列是查询，则调用此运算符将强制立即执行。Note that if the source sequence is a query, calling this operator will force immediate execution. 枚举源序列也会导致引发异常。Enumerating the source sequence can also cause exceptions to be thrown. 目标表的架构基于源序列中第一行的架构。The schema of the destination table is based on the schema of the first row in the source sequence. 表元数据从的元数据和表值中提取。The table metadata is extracted from the metadata and the table values from the column values of the . 对于类型化，不会保留类型。For a typed , types are not preserved. 传输数据和架构，但输出表的结果行不是类型化的类型。The data and schema are transferred, but the resulting rows of the output table will not be of the typed type. 在从源复制到 返回 的 过程中，不会保留和属性。 The and properties are not preserved during the copy from the source to the returned . 在 源 中找到值为**null**的空引用或可为 null 的类型时，此方法会将目标中的值替换为的值。When a **null** reference or nullable type with a value of **null** is found in a source , this method replaces the value in the destination with a value of . 方法返回的生成表具有默认的表名称。The generated table returned by the method has the default table name. 如果要命名、将其附加到或执行任何其他特定操作，则必须在创建并返回表后执行此操作。If you want to name the , attach it to a , or perform any other specific operation, you must do so after the table is created and returned. 有关详细信息，请参阅[从查询创建 DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-datatable-from-a-query-linq-to-dataset.md)。For more information, see [Creating a DataTable From a Query](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-datatable-from-a-query-linq-to-dataset.md). ## Examples 下面的示例在2001年8月8日之后查询 SalesOrderHeader 表中的订单， 并使用方法从该查询创建。The following example queries the SalesOrderHeader table for orders after August 8, 2001, and uses the method to create a from that query. 然后将 绑定到作为 的代理的 。The is then bound to a , which acts as proxy for a . [!code-csharp[DP LINQ to DataSet Examples#CopyToDataTable1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP LINQ to DataSet Examples/CS/Program.cs#copytodatatable1)] [!code-vb[DP LINQ to DataSet Examples#CopyToDataTable1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP LINQ to DataSet Examples/VB/Module1.vb#copytodatatable1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输入参数`T` `source`的参数只能是类型或派生自的类型。The parameter `T` of the input parameter `source` can only be of type , or a type derived from . 输入序列可以是任何源，而不仅是对的查询。The input sequence can be any source, not only a query over a . 请注意，如果源序列是查询，则调用此运算符将强制立即执行。Note that if the source sequence is a query, calling this operator will force immediate execution. 枚举源序列也会导致引发异常。Enumerating the source sequence can also cause exceptions to be thrown. 目标表的架构基于源序列中第一行的架构。The schema of the destination table is based on the schema of the first row in the source sequence. 表元数据从的元数据和表值中提取。The table metadata is extracted from the metadata and the table values from the column values of the . 对于类型化，不会保留类型。For a typed , types are not preserved. 传输数据和架构，但输出表的结果行不是类型化的类型。The data and schema are transferred, but the resulting rows of the output table will not be of the typed type. 在从源复制到 返回 的 过程中，不会保留和属性。 The and properties are not preserved during the copy from the source to the returned . 在 源 中找到值为**null**的空引用或可为 null 的类型时，此方法会将目标中的值替换为的值。When a **null** reference or nullable type with a value of **null** is found in a source , this method replaces the value in the destination with a value of . 方法返回的生成表具有默认的表名称。The generated table returned by the method has the default table name. 如果要命名、将其附加到或执行任何其他特定操作，则必须在创建并返回表后执行此操作。If you want to name the , attach it to a , or perform any other specific operation, you must do so after the table is created and returned. 有关详细信息，请参阅[从查询创建 DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-datatable-from-a-query-linq-to-dataset.md)。For more information, see [Creating a DataTable From a Query](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-datatable-from-a-query-linq-to-dataset.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输入参数`T` `source`的参数只能是类型或派生自的类型。The parameter `T` of the input parameter `source` can only be of type , or a type derived from . 输入序列可以是任何源，而不仅是对的查询。The input sequence can be any source, not only a query over a . 请注意，如果源序列是查询，则调用此运算符将强制立即执行。Note that if the source sequence is a query, calling this operator will force immediate execution. 枚举源序列也会导致引发异常。Enumerating the source sequence can also cause exceptions to be thrown. 目标表的架构基于源序列中第一行的架构。The schema of the destination table is based on the schema of the first row in the source sequence. 表元数据从的元数据和表值中提取。The table metadata is extracted from the metadata and the table values from the column values of the . 对于类型化，不会保留类型。For a typed , types are not preserved. 传输数据和架构，但输出表的结果行不是类型化的类型。The data and schema are transferred, but the resulting rows of the output table will not be of the typed type. 在从源复制到 返回 的 过程中，不会保留和属性。 The and properties are not preserved during the copy from the source to the returned . 在 源 中找到值为**null**的空引用或可为 null 的类型时，此方法会将目标中的值替换为的值。When a **null** reference or nullable type with a value of **null** is found in a source , this method replaces the value in the destination with a value of . 方法返回的生成表具有默认的表名称。The generated table returned by the method has the default table name. 如果要命名、将其附加到或执行任何其他特定操作，则必须在创建并返回表后执行此操作。If you want to name the , attach it to a , or perform any other specific operation, you must do so after the table is created and returned. 如果在将数据行复制到目标表期间引发了异常，如约束异常， `errorHandler`则调用委托。If an exception is thrown during the copy of a data row into the target table, such as a constraint exception, the `errorHandler` delegate is called. 使用以下值将传递`errorHandler`给委托： A is passed to the `errorHandler` delegate with the following values: - 属性设置为源数据的副本。The property is set to a copy of the source data. - 属性设置为目标 。 The property is set to the target . - 属性设置为捕获的异常。The property is set to the caught exception. 委托调用返回后，将读取属性。The property is read after the delegate call returns. 如果属性为`true`，则继续枚举源序列并将其加载到数据表中。 If the property is `true`, the source sequence continues to be enumerated and loaded into the data table. 如果属性为`false`，则从方法引发原始异常。 If the property is `false`, the original exception is thrown from the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[从查询创建 DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-datatable-from-a-query-linq-to-dataset.md)。For more information, see [Creating a DataTable From a Query](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-datatable-from-a-query-linq-to-dataset.md).
